page.title: 19Ghosts and Haunting
page.content: {Grayshott School}may not seem a likely place to find a ghost but many people claim to have seen one living in the store room in the {old building.}Most people say that if this is true it is most likely to be the ghost of {CATHERINE I'ANSON Catherine I'Anson visited the school quite regularly and checked children's work and took assembly. The ghost of Catherine I'Anson is supposed to have the{same face}as the real person. One night in 1981 a boy called Scott Valentine came into school to get his friend's books out for him. But Fred, the caretaker, saw him go into the classroom and then he followed him around banging the desk lids and Scott was{scared stiff} because he{thought it was the ghost!
